label: help wanted
long_description: Issue reviewed by Maintainers, and ready to be addressed. Maintainers are looking for Contributors to address this issue, anyone is welcome to work on addressing the issue.

label: refer to cac
long_description: Maintainers need advice from the Curriculum Advisory Committee to make a decision on how to proceed with the issue or pull request.

label: out of scope
description: Proposed changes are out of scope
long_description: Changes proposed in the issue or in the pull request doesn't fall within the scope of the lesson (replaces GitHub‘s „wontfix“)

label: duplicate
long_description: The concern raised in the issue or pull request has already been mentioned. This previous issues/PR should be mentioned in the comment before this label is used.

label: bug
description: Code included in the lesson needs to be fixed
long_description: Issue about the code, including challenges, answers.

label: formatting
long_description: Issue about something being wrong in the formatting of the lesson

label: template and tools
long_description: Issue or feature request about a technical aspect of the lesson (e.g., in the scripts used to render the lesson), including the documentation of these tools. Pull requests should probably be directed to https://github.com/carpentries/styles

label: instructor guide
long_description: Issue related to the content of the instructor guide. Best suited to be addressed by someone familiar with the content of the lesson

label: discussion
description: Discussion or feedback about the lesson
long_description: Issue used to ask a question about how the lesson is taught, ask for clarification. Such issues might indicate that the instructor guide or the documentation may need to be updated.

label: enhancement
long_description: Proposal to add new content to the lesson (e.g., introducing additional function, library, command, flag), or adding more technical detail on a topic already covered in the lesson. Such issues may need to be considered by the infrastructure sub-committee, the curriculum advisory committee, or other relevant group.

label: clarification
description: Suggest change for make lesson clearer
long_description: Part of a lesson which, while not incorrect (i.e., not a bug) is presented in a way that is potentially confusing or misleading. Existing content could benefit from rephrasing or rearranging.

label: teaching example
description: PR showing how lesson was modified in a workshop
long_description: PR that illustrates how someone modified the lesson in their workshop. Not intended to be merged, but as a way to document how other instructors have used the lesson. Can be closed once the label has been applied.

label: good first issue
long_description: Good issue for a new Contributor to our lesson.
